* retrieve token
  * `curl -verbose -X POST -d "grant_type=password" -d "client_id=javacream_client" -d "client_secret=83cd4cab-fc8b-4b0f-a5b9-ce90600dd0c6" -d "username=the_user" -d "password=pwd" -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' http://localhost:8160/auth/realms/javacream/protocol/openid-connect/token`
  * find and copy access token
